briefTitle: Afatinib (BIBW 2992) in Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Patients With EGFR Mutation
officialTitle: An Open Label, Multicentre, Single Arm Trial to Assess the Safety of Afatinib for Patients With Locally Advanced or Metastatic Non-small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Harboring EGFR Mutation(s)
summary: Primary objective of the trial is to evaluate the safety of afatinib in patients with locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) harboring EGFR (Epidermal growth factor receptor) mutation(s) and have never been treated with an EGFR-TKI (tyrosine kinase inhibitor). Secondary objective is to assess the time to symptomatic progression (as judged by investigator).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first drug administration up to 28 days after last drug administration, up to 1624 days.
